chinese: vt.揭示；透露；显示
english: reveal

chinese: 掀开帘布，一幅风景画展现在我们眼前。
english: The curtain opened to reveal a landscape painting

chinese: vE. 把⋯视为；注视n.尊敬；问候，关心
english: regard

chinese: 男孩把发怒的妈妈看作一只母老虎！
english: The boy regards his angry mother as a female tiger

chinese: adj. 可行的
english: viable

chinese: 她认为在交通拥挤的时候，乘地铁是一个可行的选择。
english: She deemed the subway a viable alternative option for when the traffic was bad

chinese: w使隔热；隔离，使隔绝（以免受到影
english: insulate

chinese: 这个马克杯能隔热，给我的咖啡保温。
english: This mug insulates my coffee, keeping it hot

chinese: n.思维模式
english: mindset

chinese: 有着成长型思维模式的人相信，从失败中学习可以通向未来的成功。
english: People with a growth mindset believe that learning from failure can lead to future success

chinese: n.语言学
english: linguistics

chinese: 语言学是一门研究语言的科学。
english: Linguistics is the scientific study of language

chinese: n 陆军中尉，海军上尉，空军中尉；副队长；助理官员
english: lieutenant

chinese: 我们可以从他的勋章上看出他是一名中尉。
english: We can tell his rank of lieutenant from his badges

chinese: adj.被免除的
english: exempt

chinese: 在这个旅游景点，身高在1.2米以下的儿童可以免票。
english: In this tourist spot children under 1.2 meters tall are exempt from paying entrance fee

chinese: n危险，危险的物（或人）
english: danger

chinese: 这个指示牌警告我们有危险！
english: This sign warned us that we were in danger

chinese: n.艰苦跋涉 以拉（货车），搬运
english: trek

chinese: 这群远足者正徒步翻过这座雪山。
english: These hikers are on a trek across the snowy mountain

chinese: U承认失败；承认；让步
english: concede

chinese: 在与这只疯狂的袋鼠的战斗中，我除了认输，别无选择。
english: In the fight with this crazy kangaroo, I had no choice but to concede

chinese: n.车间，工场，工作室；研讨会
english: workshop

chinese: 我把我的车留在车间修理。
english: I left my car at the workshop for repair

chinese: adj内疚的；有罪的
english: guilty

chinese: 这只狗因为破坏了客厅而感到很内疚。
english: The dog looked very guilty for destroying the living room

chinese: ad）.真诚的，诚恳的
english: sincere

chinese: 他鞠躬表示他对这个医生诚挚的谢意。
english: He bowed to show his sincere thanks to the doctor

chinese: n.恶化；降级，降格
english: degradation

chinese: 环境恶化是全球性问题。
english: environmental degradation is a global issue

chinese: ad）.优先的；选择的
english: preferential

chinese: 在公交车上，像老人或孕好这样的群体应该优先得到座位。
english: People such as the elderly or the pregnant should get preferential seats on the bus
